input.sentences: the wedding is going to start soon | the best man had better make sure he has his speech down .
everybody is riding in a limo to the ceremony .
the wedding party is all lined up for the ceremony .
before they can go to the reception | the wedding party has to take some pictures .
ahh | now formal part is over and it is time to party .
output.sentences: The nervous groom prepares for his vows
His buddies are ready to party and get his mind off the stress
They pull up in the limo completely drunk and falling over. The bridesmaids go what the heck!
Quick lets distract the bride with some photos.
And the groom slips off to continue his binge fest on alcohol while his bride wonders where he is.
